name: Legend of The Lost Video Game
name_original: Legend of The Lost Video Game
description:
This was made for the 2021 Global Game Jam! Two Friends just found out about the legend of the lost ancient video game trapped in a dungeon, and they wanna play it!

Play Tuck and Explore The Dungeon, Collect Keys, Destroy Enemies and get that video game! Additional Characters Coming Soon!

Fun-Fact this is gonna be my first fully-fledged game!

(also heads up this is my first time making a full-scale game like so obviously not everything  will be available in this game jam version)
